app_name: Cashback Deals & Rewards on Shopping with Shopkick
app_detail:
Earn rewards and get FREE Gift Cards with Shopkick! Use the Shopkick app to earn rewards on the shopping you already do at the stores you already visit. Itâ€™s easy!

Amazon, Target, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Best Buy, plus many more - discover deals, get shopping rewards and turn them into Gift Cards or cashback. Sound too good to be true? Simply download now to earn rewards (we call them â€™kicksâ€™). 

Shopping rewards, cashback & FREE Gift Cards: How to get started:
â­ï¸ Deals & rewards await! Download the app today (itâ€™s FREE).
ğŸ›’ Shopping in Target, Walmart or Best Buy? Open the app when youâ€™re in stores to earn rewards. Easy! 
âœ… Shopping made fun - Find select items to scan or purchase & rack up kicks. 
ğŸ’° Purchase the items & scan your receipt to earn even more kicks.
ğŸ Gift Cards & cashback - Redeem your kicks for amazing rewards.

Shopping online? No problem! You can earn cashback and shopping rewards online as well, at stores like Amazon, Target, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, eBay, Hotels.com, Groupon & and many more, from the comfort of your couch. Discover deals by watching videos in the app for even more kicks!

ğŸ› Use your shopping rewards to earn FREE Gift Cards to shop at stores including:
Amazon
Target
Walmart
Starbucks 
Best Buy
Nike
Sephora 
Uber 
TJ Maxx 
Marshalls
Loweâ€™s

& Many More!
Join the millions of Shopkickers who have earned over $85 million that they use to redeem FREE Gift Cards to shop at Starbucks, Amazon, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Sephora, Target & more.

The savings you earn will help keep your grocery, dining, or shopping budget healthy. Deals are great when you earn Gift Cards from everyday shopping. You can even earn bonus kicks if you purchase products & submit your receipt!
